title: (x) "Vegetarian" w/ continuous rule above type - Samarkan/Shalimar {Yves}
content:
Is this available in digital version?

Is there a term for fonts that have a continuous rule above the type?

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110120033521im_/http:/typophile.com/files/vegetarian_6443.gif)
author: kristin

comments.content:
Stuff like that could be a part of the linotype taketype collection(s), i've seen this font before, but â€¦ no, it's very quirky, i think it is a freefont.

\>Is there a term for fonts that have a continuous rule above the type?  
I don't think so, this font mimiks Hindi
You're too cool for school. Thank you!
I wouldn't know what to call this style of fonts, but what I _can_ tell you is that they are inspired by Hindi script.
